settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/currencies/show-multiple-currencies#edit-your-money-formats).

* Separate currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code ( [list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) ). Example: CAD USD. While prices can be displayed on the store front in different currencies, Shopify will process orders in the shopâ€™s main currency.
